rFbruTtySLsW.code:
// Define o BPM (140 BPM dubstep)

// Bateria pesada de dubstep
$: sound("bd*2, [~ sd]*2, hh*8")
  .bank("RolandTR909")
  .gain(1.2)

// // Sub-bass wobble característico do dubstep
$: note("<[c1 c2]*8 [bb0 bb1]*8 [f1 f2]*8 [eb1 eb2]*8>")
  .sound("sawtooth")
  .lpf("<400 800 200 600>/4")
  .gain(0.9)

// Guitarra elétrica com riffs agressivos
$: note("<[c3 eb3 g3 <bb3 c4>]*2 [bb2 d3 f3 <ab3 bb3>]*2 [f3 ab3 c4 <eb4 f4>]*2 [eb3 g3 bb3 <db4 eb4>]*2>")
  .sound("gm_electric_guitar_muted, gm_overdriven_guitar")
  .gain(0.7)

// Lead synth com notas altas
$: n("< [~ 0] 7 [0 7] [~ 7] [~ 0] 5 [0 5] [~ 5] [~ 0] 10 [0 10] [~ 10] [~ 0] 7 [0 7] [~ 7] >*2")
  .scale("C4:minor")
  .sound("square")
  .lpf(2000)
  .gain(0.6)

// Camada extra de ritmo com snares e claps
$: sound("[~ <sd cp hh>]*4")
  .bank("RolandTR909")
  .gain(0.8)

// Bass drop wobble intenso
$: note("<c1!4 bb0!4 f1!4 eb1!4>")
  .sound("sawtooth")
  .lpf("100 200 100 <50 100 200 400>/8")
  .resonance(15)
  .gain(1.1)
